comments:
I20050329-1105, Motif

"Multiple tasks have report errors.  Select an error to view its details."  This
dialog appears after doing an update from CVS, and then trying to close three
projects (that contain errors).  The dialog is flickering constantly.

If you press okay enough times, the dialog animates as if it is disappearing,
but then immediately reappears.  Since the dialog is modal, it is impossible to
do work or close Eclipse.

The top of the log (it's too large to attach) is:

!SESSION 2005-03-29 15:33:31.420 -----------------------------------------------
eclipse.buildId=I20050329-1105
java.version=1.5.0-beta2
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=linux, ARCH=x86, WS=motif, NL=en_US
Command-line arguments:  -os linux -ws motif -arch x86 -clean -data
/home/dpollock/Source/Eclipse/Workspaces/3.1
